answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Andy – I hope the following is helpful:
Albany, CA - Albany's Poet Laureate
http://www.albanyca.org/index.aspx?page=725
Mayor Nutter to Appoint City of Philadelphia’s Second Poet Laureate
http://cityofp hiladelphia.wordpress.com/2014/01/31/mayor-nutter-to-appoint-city-of-philadelphias-second-poet-laureate/ 
About the Position of Poet Laureate Consultant in Poetry: The Poetry and Literature Center at the Library of Congress
http://www.loc.gov/poetry/about_laureate.html
Mayor Walsh Announces Poet Laureate Search During National Poetry Month
http://www.cityofboston.gov/news/default.aspx?id=6602

author: Andy White
text:
I would like to learn about other governments that are affiliated or appoint a poet laureate.   What person(s) select this poet?   How long do they serve?  Is there an honorarium?   Who 'supervises' this poet?  Do elected officials appoint the poet?    Any information would be helpful.  A quick Internet search pulled up 9 cities with P.L.'s.   Not much detail available about those programs.
Thanks!
title: Municipalities with a Poet Laureate
